Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory729.jpg'}
{3: 'The blaring tolls of the bell shake the mountain at its core, threatening to shatter the slopes at any moment, sending boulders tumbling down.'}
{3: 'No longer the melodious chimes they were at the beginning, the rhythmic blares now carry with them wrath and madness.'}
{3: 'Hanying is on a narrow, perilous trail carved between two rock walls, which only amplify the deathly knells. Even the layer of thin ice growing on the slabs is in danger of being blasted off.'}
{3: 'Over the ear-shattering noise, Hanying and Spooner have no choice but to communicate through wireless signals unique to mechanoids.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Spooner', 3: '(The tolls are getting louder and more frequent, meaning we should be drawing near the location the old man mentioned.)', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "(I think there's probably more to it...)", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "(The old man said that we'd first come across a gate keeper before seeing the mechanoid by the name of Fu Shen.)", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "(We still haven't figured out how this virtual space works, though...)", 4: '1'}

{3: "The trail makes a hairpin turn. When the last flake of frost hanging off a piece of autumn leaf flutters onto Hanying's shoulder, the blaring tolls come to an abrupt stop. Hanying stops in her tracks."}
{3: 'Right in front of them is the "Gate".'}

{1: '1', 3: 'Beams of sunlight burn through the gloomy clouds onto the summit. Showered in the flaming glow of dusk at the top of the stairway is the Gate Keeper, standing silently in front of the Gate.'}

{3: "It is no doubt a mechanoid. Reflecting the sun's radiance is a little evening frost clinging onto the machine's exposed metal parts. The entity is acting as if it has been here since the beginning of time."}
{3: 'Hanying gestures for Spooner to halt.'}
{3: 'The Gate Keeper speaks without moving an inch.'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'How do you know our names?', 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: 'I was given the duty of guarding the Gate, so I must know the names of those who come.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'We are here to rescue our friends. Please let us through.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Gate Keeper', 3: 'The bell tolls were a warning...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Are you controlled by the bell, too?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Gate Keeper', 3: 'I am the Gate Keeper. I only answer to the Gate.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'I have to enter this Gate.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Gate Keeper', 3: 'This is my duty as the Gate Keeper.', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg3501_05.jpg'}
{3: 'The Gate Keeper shows no sign of letting the trespassers through.'}
{2: 'Gate Keeper', 3: '...'}
{2: 'Gate Keeper', 3: 'I have to enter this Gate—this is exactly what a traveler that came before the two of you said, too.'}
{2: 'Gate Keeper', 3: 'They were looking for a way to leave this world, too.'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Was it Yoyo?'}
{2: 'Gate Keeper', 3: 'You mean Pulao, who also goes by the name of Yoyo.'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Did Yoyo pass through here?'}
{2: 'Gate Keeper', 3: 'Yes, she did.'}
{2: 'Gate Keeper', 3: 'The tolls of the bell let them in.'}
{2: 'Gate Keeper', 3: 'But not the two of you.'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'What if we insist?'}
{2: 'Gate Keeper', 3: "What if the Gate doesn't lead you to where you want to go? What if it's just another dream?"}
{2: 'Gate Keeper', 3: 'Would you still enter?'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'All dreams must come to an end...'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'You leave us with no choice but to fight our way through if you refuse to let us pass.'}
{3: 'The Gate Keeper falls silent. He stands there quietly, awaiting the challenge of those who attempt to pass.'}
{3: 'A moment of silence follows as both sides ready themselves for a grueling fight.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory729.jpg'}
{2: 'Gate Keeper', 3: 'Do you have the key?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The Gate Keeper looks at Hanying with a confused expression for a moment before nodding his head and moving out of the way.'}
{2: 'Gate Keeper', 3: 'Looks like you have no clue...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Gate Keeper', 3: 'You can enter now. Please.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Spooner', 3: 'What in the world is going on...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Gate Keeper', 3: 'There is a key for every lock. You have the key to this lock.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Gate Keeper', 3: 'A lock can only be opened by its key.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'A tiny speck of light suddenly appears on Hanying.'}
{3: "It's a tiny, dried, unremarkable seed, glowing in a warm hue."}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'The little seed the old man gave me... is a key?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'This is all you need to enter the Gate?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Gate Keeper', 3: 'I am just the Gate Keeper. Travelers must open the Gate themselves.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Hanying climbs up the stairs hesitantly and stops in front of the Gate with the tiny seed in her hand.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiFogNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: 'Mountain mist surges in through the Gate, bathing everything in a dusty white.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory719.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1.5'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiFogNew.prefab'}
{3: "The view changes completely in the flick of a moment. The treacherous trail and the passage have disappeared. All that's left is the tightly sealed, lonesome Gate and a crumbling half-wall."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Gate Keeper', 3: "It might just be another dream beyond this Gate—now, you've been warned.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Gate Keeper', 3: 'This is your last chance. You can still turn back and walk away from the Gate.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Gate Keeper', 3: 'But if you open the Gate, there will be things... that we need to accept.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Gate Keeper', 3: "It's a disgrace for a Gate Keeper to let anyone pass through the Gate.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Gate Keeper', 3: 'Once you open the Gate, I will try to stop you from going forward—and die.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'I would rather not fight you or kill you if I could.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Gate Keeper', 3: 'Guarding the Gate is the meaning of my existence and nothing would change that.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Gate Keeper', 3: '...I am sure you know what you have to do. We will all accept our fate... eventually.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'The mechanoid turns to face away from the Gate and resumes its original, upright stance.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Hanying grabs onto the rusty door knocker and pushes open the Gate without hesitation...'}
